ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:42:57 [Issue ID 4000-111774] urn:comicvine:4000-111774 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 06:16:57. [Issue ID 262229]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Freak Force's only chance to stop a plague of flesh eating ants may be to team up with a malicious cult of super-technological soldiers.
Contains a Freak Force Pin up by Ben Herrera and Mike Miller. It also contains the runner up drawings for the ultimate character creating contest.
ComicInfo.Title: The Ultimate Character Creating Contest Runners-Up!
